method.name: TryDistinctByID
method.summary: Builds a set of items distinct by their ID.
method.param: Resulting HashSet containing one item per ID, or null on failure.
method.returns: True on success; false on null input or failure.

method.name: TryCloneDistinctByID
method.summary: Clones items and builds a set distinct by their ID.
method.param: Resulting HashSet of cloned items with distinct IDs, or null on failure.
method.returns: True on success; false on null input or failure.

method.name: TryAddByID
method.summary: Adds items to a target set when their ID is not already present.
method.param: Target HashSet to receive new items.
Items to add to the target by unique ID.
The count of items added to the target.
method.returns: True on success; false on null input or failure.
